mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_ID, PARENT_ID, CREATE_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update sys_menu
MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_menu set MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select b.* from SYS_ROLE_MENU a left join SYS_MENU b on a.MENU_ID = b.id where a.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
